entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight with risk of freezing rain. Fog at times overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning with risk of freezing rain. Fog at times in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h late in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Saturday 8 April 2023
